name: Finger Guns
description:
Finger Guns is a VR shooter, where the player has been kidnapped along with their technology. Through a series of intense combat, traverse through the prison in order to recover your stolen technology. Escaping will take more than just the strength of your weapons, but also extreme thinking and knowledge.

Game is developed by The Renegades

Team Lead: Mason Gaw

Production Manager: Sam Beckmann

Technical Design: Rob Reddick

Aesthetics Lead: Ike Ajah
